name: Learn-vim
tagline: A list of resources for learning the Vim editor
body:

  • Vim documentation: quickref

  • What is your most productive shortcut with Vim? - Stack Overflow
  • Your problem with Vim is that you don't grok vi.
  • Vim Airline
  • spf13-vim - The Ultimate Vim Distribution

  • Smash Into Vim: PeepCode Screencast

  • Vim Tips Wiki
  • Configuring Vim right
  • Vim - walking without crutches
